statements: SELECT * FROM CDRs ORDER BY call_start_time DESC;
SELECT id, caller_number, callee_number, call_duration, call_cost FROM CDRs WHERE call_duration > 300 ORDER BY call_start_time ASC;
SELECT caller_number, callee_number, call_cost FROM CDRs WHERE call_cost >= 50.00;
SELECT id, call_start_time, call_end_time FROM CDRs WHERE call_start_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT id, call_duration FROM CDRs WHERE caller_number = '1234567890' OR callee_number = '9876543210';
SELECT * FROM CDRs WHERE call_duration > 300 ORDER BY call_start_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, caller_number, call_duration, call_start_time FROM CDRs WHERE caller_number = '+1234567890';
SELECT callee_number, SUM(call_cost) AS total_cost FROM CDRs GROUP BY callee_number HAVING total_cost > 1000 ORDER BY total_cost DESC;
SELECT AVG(call_duration) AS avg_duration FROM CDRs WHERE MONTH(call_start_time) = 6;
SELECT id, call_duration FROM CDRs WHERE call_start_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY call_duration DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM CDRs WHERE call_duration > 10 ORDER BY call_time DESC;
SELECT caller_id, receiver_id, call_duration FROM CDRs WHERE call_type = 'incoming' ORDER BY caller_id ASC;
SELECT id, caller_id, receiver_id, call_duration, call_time FROM CDRs WHERE call_time >= '2022-01-01' AND call_time <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT id, call_time, call_type FROM CDRs WHERE call_type IN ('incoming', 'outgoing') ORDER BY call_time ASC;
SELECT id, call_duration FROM CDRs WHERE caller_id = 12345 OR receiver_id = 54321;
SELECT * FROM CDRs WHERE call_duration > 60 ORDER BY call_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT caller_id, receiver_id, call_duration FROM CDRs WHERE call_type='outgoing' ORDER BY caller_id ASC, receiver_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT caller_id, receiver_id FROM CDRs WHERE call_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY caller_id, receiver_id;
SELECT AVG(call_duration) AS avg_duration, MAX(call_duration) AS max_duration FROM CDRs GROUP BY caller_id ORDER BY avg_duration DESC;
SELECT pattern_name, call_frequency, average_call_duration FROM CallPatterns WHERE call_frequency > 100 ORDER BY pattern_name ASC, call_frequency DESC;
SELECT * FROM CDRs;
SELECT caller_phone_number, receiver_phone_number, call_cost FROM CDRs WHERE call_duration > INTERVAL '10 minutes';
SELECT id, billing_period_start, total_call_cost FROM Billing WHERE payment_status = 'Pending';
SELECT phone_number, call_count FROM CallPatterns ORDER BY call_count DESC;
SELECT caller_phone_number, receiver_phone_number, call_start, call_end FROM CDRs WHERE call_start BETWEEN TIMESTAMP '2022-01-01' AND TIMESTAMP '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM CDRs WHERE call_duration > INTERVAL '10' MINUTE;
SELECT caller_phone_number, receiver_phone_number, call_start FROM CDRs WHERE call_start BETWEEN TIMESTAMP '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND TIMESTAMP '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT AVG(call_cost) AS average_call_cost FROM CDRs;
SELECT caller_phone_number, receiver_phone_number, EXTRACT(DAY FROM call_end) AS end_day FROM CDRs WHERE call_end BETWEEN TIMESTAMP '2022-02-01 00:00:00' AND TIMESTAMP '2022-02-28 23:59:59';
SELECT phone_number, SUM(call_count) AS total_call_count FROM CallPatterns GROUP BY phone_number HAVING total_call_count > 50;
SELECT * FROM CDRs WHERE call_duration > 300;
SELECT caller_number, receiver_number FROM CDRs WHERE call_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT SUM(total_amount) AS total_billing FROM Billing WHERE payment_status = 'PAID';
SELECT analysis_id, call_type, call_rating FROM CallAnalysis WHERE call_rating >= 4 ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email, phone_number FROM Users WHERE username LIKE 'john%' AND email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM CDRs;
SELECT caller_number, receiver_number, call_date FROM CDRs WHERE call_duration > 300;
SELECT Users.username, CallAnalysis.call_type, CallAnalysis.call_rating FROM Users JOIN CallAnalysis ON Users.user_id = CallAnalysis.cdr_id;
SELECT caller_number, call_duration FROM CDRs WHERE call_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT Users.username, Billing.total_amount, Billing.payment_status FROM Users JOIN Billing ON Users.user_id = Billing.cdr_id;
SELECT * FROM cdrs LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, caller_number, receiver_number FROM cdrs WHERE call_duration > 300;
SELECT * FROM billing WHERE payment_status = 'PAID';
SELECT name, address, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM call_logs WHERE call_type = 'INCOMING' AND logged_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM cdrs WHERE call_duration > 60 ORDER BY call_datetime DESC;
SELECT customers.name, cdrs.caller_number, billing.amount FROM customers JOIN cdrs ON customers.id = cdrs.id JOIN billing ON cdrs.id = billing.cdr_id;
SELECT call_logs.id, call_logs.call_type, customers.name FROM call_logs JOIN cdrs ON call_logs.cdr_id = cdrs.id JOIN customers ON cdrs.id = customers.id;
SELECT analysis.caller_location, analysis.receiver_location, customers.phone_number FROM analysis JOIN cdrs ON analysis.cdr_id = cdrs.id JOIN customers ON cdrs.id = customers.id;
SELECT * FROM billing WHERE payment_status = 'Pending' OR payment_status = 'Overdue' ORDER BY amount DESC;
